data.generators.util

Class OverlappingGaussianGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.generators.util.OverlappingGaussianGenerator

  • public class OverlappingGaussianGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class generates overlapping Gaussian test data. It has an imbalanced mode to use for testing under class imbalance.

      Constructor and Description
      OverlappingGaussianGenerator() 
      OverlappingGaussianGenerator(boolean imbalancedMode)

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public static DataSet generate(int dim,
               int numCat,
               boolean imbalancedMode,
               int catMin,
               int catMax)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates the data without persisting the model or the data to a file.
        Parameters:
        dim - Integer that is the number of dimensions.
        numCat - Integer that is the number of categories.
        imbalancedMode - Boolean flag indicating whether to generate an imbalanced dataset.
        catMin - Integer that is the minimal category size.
        catMax - Integer that is the maximal category size.
        Returns:
        DataSet that was generated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generate

        public static DataSet generate(int dim,
               int numCat,
               boolean imbalancedMode,
               int catMin,
               int catMax,
               float alpha,
               float beta)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates the data without persisting the model or the data to a file.
        Parameters:
        dim - Integer that is the number of dimensions.
        numCat - Integer that is the number of categories.
        imbalancedMode - Boolean flag indicating whether to generate an imbalanced dataset.
        catMin - Integer that is the minimal category size.
        catMax - Integer that is the maximal category size.
        alpha - Float that is the parameter controlling how many stDevs away from the paired selected mean should the next feature value mean be placed.
        beta - Float that is the parameter controlling the dispersion update.
        Returns:
        DataSet that was generated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates the data according to user input.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line args, as specified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
